Hello,

home.teaser:
Extreme lazy human.
But laziness is at the bases of the most wonderful invention of the world.
Laziness = inventions

items.name: Web Developer
items.text: Development of websites using the Symfony framework or CMS Drupal, depending on the needs I take care of the front-end developments (assembly and dynamization of the theme) and / or back-end (web service management, database queries etc ... ).

items.name: Inbound call center operator
items.text: Call center operator for inbound service on use of the Intesa San Paolo company section site.

items.name: Technical employee
items.text: Technical analysis of prototype vehicles, compilation of files relating to the analyzes carried out, creation of reports for customers, management of test routes for vehicles.

items.name: CSEA G. Ceppi di Orbassano (TO)
items.text: Course for web developer and web designer, ASP.net, SQL server, PHP, MySQL, Javascript, Flash and actionscript, Photoshop, C#, English language.

items.name: IIS E. Amaldi di Orbassano (TO), Immaginazione e lavoro di Torino
items.text: Post-graduate specialization in routing, switching, wireless technologies and computer networks.

items.name: IIS E. Amaldi di Orbassano (TO)
items.text: Diploma of expert in electronics and telecommunications.
